title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create a mini calculator! Write code that:
1. Displays the result of 15 + 27
2. Displays the result of 100 - 45
3. Displays the result of 6 * 7 (the * symbol means multiply)
instructions:
Create a mini calculator! Write code that:
1. Displays the result of 15 + 27
2. Displays the result of 100 - 45
3. Displays the result of 6 * 7 (the * symbol means multiply)

hints.text: Follow the same pattern as the first line: console.log(), put the math inside the parentheses, and end with a semicolon.

commonMistakes.consequence: console.log('100 - 45'); will display the text '100 - 45' instead of doing the math.
commonMistakes.correction: Remove the quotes to make the computer calculate it.
You need console.log() to actually show the result.

commonMistakes.consequence: Using x instead of * for multiplication.
commonMistakes.correction: Make sure you use * for multiplication.
